features: 30-count box of Band-Aid Brand Ourtone Flexible Fabric Adhesive Bandages in assorted sizes of shade BR65 for first aid and wound protection of minor wounds, cuts, scrapes and burns

Made with Memory Weave fabric for comfort and flexibility, these first aid bandages stretch, bend, and flex with your skin as you move, and include a Quilt-Aid Comfort Pad designed to cushion painful wounds which may help prevent reinjury
These adhesive bandages stay on for up to 24 hours and feature a unique Quit-Aid Pad that won't stick to the wound as they wick away blood and fluids, allowing for gentle removal
From the #1 doctor recommended bandage brand, Band-Aid Brand Ourtone Fabric Adhesive Bandages help protect against dirt and germs that may cause infection.

Launching a range of bandages in light (BR45), medium (BR55), and deep (BR65) shades for Brown skin tones, Band-Aid Brand Ourtone Adhesive Bandages embrace the beauty of diverse skin while protecting your minor cuts, scrapes and wounds
body.description: Band-Aid Brand Ourtone Flexible Fabric Adhesive Bandages in assorted sizes provide a skin tone complementing wound care option in shades for Brown skin tones. Designed to match with your skin tone, these fabric bandages in shade BR65 are made with Memory Weave fabric to cover and protect minor wounds, cuts and scrapes by stretching, bending, and flexing with your skin as you move. From the #1 doctor recommended bandage brand, the flexible skin tone bandages protect against dirt and germs for up to 24 hours to help with your healing wounds. Each bandage features a Quilt-Aid pad for complete coverage that won't stick to the wound as it wicks away blood and fluids, allowing for gentle removal. Apply the sterile adhesive bandage to clean, dry skin for minor wound care and change daily, when wet, or as needed. Launching a range of bandages in light (BR45), medium (BR55) and deep (BR65) shades for Brown skin tones, Band-Aid Brand Ourtone Adhesive Bandages embrace the beauty of diverse skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally, bandages that aren't racist! /s
reviews.reviewText: Since when are Band-Aids supposed to match your skin? They don't match most white people's skin either. And fabric Band-Aids have always been dark colored.But these were cheaper than "white people" Band-Aids. I hope I'm not accused of cultural appropriation or mockery. /s

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Same color as my skin
reviews.reviewText: I was pleasantly surprised when I used these bandades. And they looked like I did not have a bandaids on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Learn from Fenty
reviews.reviewText: The bandages work great at protecting wounds. However, come off easily when wet. It took some time for the makeup and hosiery industries to understand the benefits of having more diversity in their products. I would need an industry leader such as Band-Aid to offer more than three tones! Right to left: regular Band-Aid, next BR45, then BR 55. I barely note a difference between the first two shades. Unfortunately, I no longer have their deepest shade on hand, (BR 65, I believe) but imagine semisweet dark chocolate. C'mon! To the manufacturer: If younger brands, i.e., Fenty, Sheertex, etc, can deliver a range of tones, why can't a brand that has become synonymous with the product? Only kids like obvious bandages, adults, not so much! And if you're worried about your bottom line, sell in Ulta or Sephora and watch the market respond.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The tape is the best
reviews.reviewText: The tape has strong but not too tacky adhesion. It lasts a very long time. Extremely comfortable. I'm not sure the cost is fair, but you pay for comfort.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars COMMODITY BASED DECISION
reviews.reviewText: WE DON'T REALLY GIVE A FLYING F WHAT COLOR A BAND-AID IS. ITS SOMETHING YOU APPLY TO COVER A CUT ON SKIN. WE DO CARE THAT THE LIGHT TAN VERSION OF THE EXACT SAME PRODUCT IS TWICE THE PRICE. IF YOU DON'T APPLY SOME RULES OF FASHION TO YOUR BAND-AIDS THIS IS THE FABRIC GO TO LOW PRICE LEADER.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Same as any other bandaid, melanin colored!
reviews.reviewText: This bandaid is the same as any other bandaid, it holds the same qualities, and I like the idea of "ourtone" colors. It has the same amount of adhesive as the others, the same coverage depending on size, and it works great!
